triggers.name: tibco-wi-rest
triggers.description: This API will receives all events generated from Slack and SlackBot will respond to it

handlers.description: This will handle the incoming slack bot events and respond to it accordingly
handlers.name: Slack_Events

handlers.description: This will receive the processed file details and send it to slack thread
handlers.name: SendResponseToSlackFileUploadRequest

handlers.description: This will handle the slack interactivity modals
handlers.name: Slack_Interactivity

triggers.name: tibco-appstartup
triggers.description: This trigger allows you to execute flows before other triggers in the application are started. This is useful in initializing application specific tasks.

handlers.description: This will find the bot user Id and assign it to the shared variable for later use.
handlers.name: FindBotUserId

data.name: Slack Events
data.description: This will handle the incoming slack bot events and respond to it accordingly

tasks.name: ReplyToTrigger1
tasks.description: Reply back to the trigger and continue flow execution, it must be used only in the flow with the trigger configured.

tasks.description: Enable sharing of data within or across flows in the application

mapping.text:
=string.concat("Hello<@",$activity[Mapper].output.event.user, ">
I am *Contract Translation Bot* :information_desk_person:

 How can I help you today? 

 	_1. Translate Contract_ 
	_2. I'm just wandering around!_ :slightly_smiling_face: ")

text.text:
Welcome to the *Smart Contract App* on Slack. 
You can quickly send below message to receive the available Menu List. 

 `@contract translation automation hello`

You're *Awesome*!   :partying_face: 

See you soon with more contract documents! :tada: 
- Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:

Connection.name: connection
Connection.title: Google Connector

settings.name: description
settings.value: Google doc connector for DeepL Integration with TCI

display.name: Service Account Key
display.description:
Paste the contents of the service account key in this field.
This should have be a JSON formatted file

Connection.connectorDescription: Google doc connector for DeepL Integration with TCI

tasks.name: get_SourceLang
tasks.description: Enable sharing of data within or across flows in the application

mapping.text:
=string.concat("Hello <@", $activity[FileContents].output.event.user, "> :wave: 

Thanks for sharing your contract with us. 
 Details we received for processing:","

"," Contract Name:	 _",$activity[FileContents].output.event.files[0].name,"_ 
 File Size (KB) :	 ",(($activity[FileContents].output.event.files[0].size)/1024)," 
 Target Language:","	",$activity[get_SourceLang].output.data,"

Please wait while we translate your contract :page_facing_up: document to the target language. 
")

post.description: This is the main flow where the contracts are cased, processed and managed through different states

serviceMetadata.fe_metadata: {"serviceId":"tcius-a29ic2Z3cGN3NHh5bXJoMmdkaHpqN3JjNmM0NTZocnU","title":"SmartContract_Translator","description":"Simple REST Trigger","swaggerChecksum":"08d283caa28cf21e8bfd420927d8ca1afb4d3e225ecb45c0bc8682b2f7d6cbb7","extAuthz":["tenant-basic"],"assurance":"draft","baseURL":"https://integration.cloud.tibcoapps.com","path":"/gsbc/01ESNQMKRQ3KDR810WJMXQCPZW/tci/kobsfwpcw4xymrh2gdhzj7rc6c456hru","apiSpec":{"definitions":{},"info":{"description":"Simple REST Trigger","title":"SmartContract_Translator","version":"1.0.0"},"paths":{"/process":{"post":{"consumes":["application/json"],"description":"This is the main flow where the contracts are cased, processed and managed through different states","operationId":"post_process","parameters":[{"description":"Request parameter","in":"query","name":"user","required":true,"type":"string"},{"description":"Request parameter","in":"query","name":"slackChannel","required":true,"type":"string"},{"description":"Request parameter","in":"query","name":"sourceFileName","required":true,"type":"string"},{"description":"Request parameter","in":"query","name":"thead_ts_replyTo","required":true,"type":"string"},{"description":"Request parameter","in":"query","name":"docID","required":true,"type":"string"},{"description":"Request parameter","in":"query","name":"targetLang","required":true,"type":"string"},{"description":"Request parameter","in":"query","name":"CompanyName","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"","schema":{"type":"string"}}},"summary":"ContractTranslation"}}},"swagger":"2.0","host":"integration.cloud.tibcoapps.com","schemes":["https"],"basePath":"/gsbc/01ESNQMKRQ3KDR810WJMXQCPZW/tci/kobsfwpcw4xymrh2gdhzj7rc6c456hru"},"intercom":true,"intercomRegion":"us-west-2","asrPath":"/process","asrOperation":"post"}

text.text:
I'm sorry :pleading_face: but I'm unable to process the attached :books:. 
 Please redo the task or verify your *Contract Document* :books: is correct and valid. 

Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:

mapping.title: =$activity[GoogleDocsGet].Output.name
mapping.initial_comment:
=string.concat("Hello again <@",$flow.body.user,">	:mega:, 

*Good News* - your contract document is processed successfully. Attached is your translated contract document :books: 

 We have also uploaded the copy of your translated document to  <https://docs.google.com/document/d/",$activity[GoogleDocsGet].Output.id,"/view# | Google Drive > 

 See you soon with more contracts! :tada: 
")

mapping.title: =$activity[GoogleDocsGet].Output.name
mapping.initial_comment:
=string.concat("Hello again <@",$flow.body.user,">	:wave:, 

*Good News* - your contract document is processed successfully. Attached is your translated contract document :books: 

 See you soon with more contracts! :tada: 
")
